title: Farther Bag Co Psychic Medium is Back
content:
Memphis, Tennessee-based Farther Bag Co just announced the return of the Psychic Medium ($120) handlebar bag. The bag maker made some small tweaks to the bag’s lid so it sits a little nicer and is easier to open and close, making for less-clunky corners. Another update is that all the high-stress areas are bar-tacked now. The Psychic Medium is a handlebar bag that fits in the “ever ride” category and measures 10.5″ x 5.5″ x 6.5″.

On top of the Psychic Medium, Farther also restocked: Little Tubes, Stem Bags, Everyday Crossbody, Parachute Packs, and Dangler Pro.

Check it all out at Farther Bag Co!

The post Farther Bag Co Psychic Medium is Back appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
